deweni darshanaya.boralle magi uman margaya.klemo bomba apita bohoma dura ithihasayak wage danunata eeka echchara parana kathawak nemeyi.kohomath klemo bombe prashnaya api issaraha nirupanayata aadhara wena eka aadharakayak witharayi.wallawayen kolambaata ena nikama tharuwak wena sihina loke suduwak bawa amathaka karala eeka prathyakshayak karagena jiwath weddi baththaramulle kellatath eeka prathyakshayakma wena eka thamayi arumaya.aththatama arumayak nemeyi neda?

adhyapana welada kalapa ha sarasawi wasimata erehi anthare wirodhaya ~ anthar wishwawidyalayiya shishya balamandalaya adhyapana welada kalapa ha sarasawi wasimata erehi anthare wirodhaya adhyapana welada kalapa aarambha kirima sadaha sarasawi paddhathiya wasa damimata erehiwa anthar wishwawidyala shishya balamandalaya magin ada dina kotuwa dum riya pola idiripita udghoshanayak pawathwu athara me sadaha sisun 2000kata aasanna pirisak sahabagi wiya.

anil gunarathna saha malani gunarathna yana abhiyachanadhikarana winisuru madulla idiriyehi mema pethsama kandawana ladi.waliweriya pradeshayen ema karmanthashalawa iwath kirime katayuthu methek sidu kara awasanwa nathi bawin saha thama jala gataluwata methek piliyamak nomathi bawin ema karmantha shalawata erehiwa gonu kala pethsama digatama pawathwagena yana bawa pethsamkaruwange nithignyawaraya mehi di adhikaranayata danum dunneya.ee anuwa pethsama digatama pawathwagena yamata awasara dun adhikaranaya pethsama sambandha wirodhatha athoth labana aprel masa 2 dina ho eeta pera gonu karana lesa wagauththarakaruwanta niyama wiya.simasahitha parisarika yukthi kendraya, saha siyana jalaya surakime jana nangumehi kandawumkaru ech.

numbaa mata nokiyehiya, ada wana thuru ee gana ma asuweth nathayi kiya. 27 aaba්raham bataluwan saha gonun gena abimelekta dunneya; owhu dedena giwisumak karagaththoya. 28 aaba්raham ralen batalu nambiyan sath denaku wenkota thabuweya. 29 abimelekda: numbaa wenkota thabu me batalu nambiyan sathdena kumak pinisadayi aaba්rahamta kiya. 30 ohu: me linda ma wisin harewu bawata me batalu nambiyan sathdena mata sakshiyak pinisa mage athin piligannayi kiya. 31 eheyin ohu ee sthanayata beyar-sheba *(diwurume linda) yayi nam thabiya.
